verses.name: Judges 9:29
verses.text: And would to God this people were under my hand! then would I remove Abimelech. And he said to Abimelech, Increase thine army, and come out.

verses.name: Judges 9:30
verses.text: And when Zebul the ruler of the city heard the words of Gaal the son of Ebed, his anger was kindled.

verses.name: Judges 9:31
verses.text: And he sent messengers unto Abimelech privily, saying, Behold, Gaal the son of Ebed and his brethren be come to Shechem; and, behold, they fortify the city against thee.

verses.name: Judges 9:32
verses.text: Now therefore up by night, thou and the people that is with thee, and lie in wait in the field:
